abstract: Eduardo Castro-Wright, vice chairman of Wal-Mart Stores, discusses important leadership lessons and what he looks for in job candidates.
snippet: Eduardo Castro-Wright, vice chairman of Wal-Mart Stores, discusses important leadership lessons and what he looks for in job candidates.
lead_paragraph: This interview of Eduardo Castro-Wright, vice chairman of Wal-Mart Stores, was conducted and condensed by Adam Bryant.

headline.main: In a Word, He Wants Simplicity
headline.print_headline: In a Word, He Wants Simplicity
